<<<<<<< HEAD
An Italian grammer; vvritten in Latin by Scipio Lentulo a Neapolitane: and turned in Englishe: by H.G. Italicae grammatices praecepta. English Lentulo, Scipione, 1525 or 6-1599. Grantham, Henry, fl. 1571-1587.
[4], 155, [1] p.
By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the Blackefrieres, Imprinted at London : 1575.
A translation of: Italicae grammatices praecepta. Translator's dedication signed: Henry Grantham. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
